It is my duty to address directly to the people who are the source of the authorities and the sovereign, especially to the young people to explain to them and through them the motives that dictated my decision

The Constitution provides me with several options that I will study to see the most appropriate for the benefit of citizens who have been deprived of their constitutional right to vote and stand for office
I was asked how to sign a law and then challenge it. Article (19) of the Constitution does not allow for a review before the Constitutional Council by law before it is issued
The response of the law is to pave the way to a void because the Council becomes unable to convene for the end of the legislative decade
Today I signed the review of the challenge of its constitutionality, and I hope that the Constitutional Council will make its decision on it as impartially and as quickly as possible

It is my hope that the Constitutional Council will take a decision with all impartiality and speed, and that everyone should allow the members of the Council to be thankful to the authorities that have appointed them
The Joint Committees and the Parliamentary Communications Committee have consumed all the time available to agree on the drafting of a new electoral law
In addition to the failure to hold the plenary session of the House of Representatives and delay until the last day of the current decade

Balkan pain is a pain that never stops in our hearts. It is a great pain to be torn apart from the lands that have been dwelling for centuries.
It does not focus on our balkans. NATO does not want to get into NATO because these countries are strengthening like Turkey.
We can not deal with Turkey now that these countries have also hesitations to come. Soon will be manifest right.
In the past we are living in a similar kind of trap set up to bring governments together.
We see that the main opposition party, which can not achieve success in the Chest and can not provide it, provokes these actions.
Protestoysa did your protest. Legal illegal. Is it like to plant trees?
In our time we imported trees from the outside. They were over 10 years old. I planted over 2 billion saplings.
If this nation is a dictator who is a servant, I can not find anything to eat. My rule was no different from service.
I congratulate #Kazakhstan for adopting the #GreenEconomy Concept and Action Plan / Strategy 2050
Read my speech this afternoon at Gumilyov Eurasian National University @ENUofficial in #Astana #Kazakhstan http://t.co/VjweQ1RYEZ
Democracy is not given by destroying the struggle.
The police went extreme using pepper spray. But when the police go, then they burn the place and destroy them.
Community psychology is such a thing; a marginal group there could lead society.
CHP Chairman Kadıköy canceled the meeting and invited everyone to Taksim. MHP and BDP did not get involved in this. CHP alone in the middle.
If they had taken 20 thousand people to Taksim, I would dedicate 500 thousand people to Kazlıçeşme. We have that ability, that power.
The floor of my party is constantly calling for us to say, 'We will remain silent against them,' but we stopped calmly.
We have received 21.5 million votes, but they will come and dominate. We will not allow such a thing.
We have forbidden the sale of alcohol near mosques and schools with this arrangement. We ran it on the highways and gas stations.
We do not have a goal like alcohol. This is the law that we have taken to protect our youth completely.
